backend/main.mo: Main canister defining order, user profile, and access-control logic with functions for profile management and order submission.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module passing through old actor state to new actor format without transformation.
backend/old.mo: Old actor state definition including legacy order structure with signature instead of full ID info.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a specific admin-panel reliability feature to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Comprehensive deployment guide explaining how to deploy the backend to the Internet Computer and the frontend to cPanel.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React application entry point.
frontend/public/.htaccess: Optional Apache configuration enabling compression, caching, security headers, and MIME fixes for cPanel hosting.
frontend/public/DEPLOYMENT.md: Frontend-only deployment guide for hosting the React build on cPanel while connecting to the IC backend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Implements hash-based routing, authentication-aware navigation, and admin link logic for rendering main pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Gates admin-only content with login checks, admin verification, and error or denial screens.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentCon: Admin form for updating an orderâ€™s payment/contact status and notes with validation and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for login state and errors.
frontend/src/components/LoginRequiredScr: Displays a card prompting unauthenticated users to log in before ordering.
frontend/src/components/SignaturePad.tsx: Canvas-based signature input component allowing draw, clear, and data URL export.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Fetches and caches whether the current authenticated user is an admin via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status handling via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting orders and fetching or updating order data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Implements hooks for retrieving and updating the caller's user profile, with identity-aware cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, dark mode, typography, transitions, and layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin-only page that loads order details, displays uploaded photo/signature, and allows updating payment contact status. Handles loading states and missing orders.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin orders dashboard that fetches all orders, applies filters and search, computes stats, and displays results with UI components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the marketing homepage with a hero section, navigation buttons, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's orders, showing a login prompt when unauthenticated and detailed order info when selected.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details and automatically opens a modal with payment contact instructions. Shows order ID and confirmation messaging.
frontend/src/pages/OrderPage.tsx: Provides a full order form with validation, ID info entry, photo upload, signature capture, and order submission. Requires authentication before allowing order creation.
frontend/src/pages/PricesPage.tsx: Shows pricing information, included features, and sample quantity tiers. Provides navigation to the order page.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and edit their profile information with validation and save functionality. Checks admin access and displays loading or login screens as needed.
frontend/src/utils/assetPaths.ts: Provides helpers to generate base-path-safe URLs for static assets and documents using the app's BASE_URL.
frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts: Validates image file type and size and includes a utility to convert files to byte arrays.
frontend/src/utils/idGenerators.ts: Generates random full names and US-style addresses using local lists and number helpers.
frontend/src/utils/orderFormatting.ts: Formats order dates and converts order and payment status enums to readable labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters, including session storage helpers and hash-parameter handling.
frontend/src/utils/usStates.ts: Exports a constant list of US states with value and label fields for dropdowns.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, features, and pending admin panel and SEO tasks.
